name: CICD | FUNC | (Slack) Display Quality Check Results
description: When there is a function call, do action and other actions

properties.label: Method
properties.name: method
properties.hint: GET, POST, PUT or DELETE.  For PUT method, "id" is mandatory.

block.name: call_recipe
block.description: Call CICD | FUNC | Get Execution Results

input.sample_document: {"results": [{"rule":"Connection Naming Convention","result":"fail","message":"Naming convention does not adhere to naming standards","asset_id":"","asset_name":"conn_http_invalid_name.connection.json","asset_type":"connection"},{"rule":"Documentation/comments","result":"fail","message":"Consider adding more comments to the recipe steps.","asset_id":"","asset_name":"trigger_aqs_manually.recipe.json","asset_type":"recipe"}]}

input.initial_comment:
="*Quality Check Results:*

Execution ID: `" +_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"d138fd3e","path":["result","execution_id"]}')+ "` 
Result: `" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"d138fd3e","path":["result","results",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"result"]}').titleize + "`   Overall Score: `" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"d138fd3e","path":["result","results",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"percentage_score"]}') + "`"

blocks.section_text:

Result: `" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"d138fd3e","path":["result","results",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"result"]}').titleize + "`   Overall Score: `" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"d138fd3e","path":["result","results",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"percentage_score"]}') + "`"
